"A.P.242/3/25/10:30": "Our calculations show that erecting a barrier in Omega will have an adequate effect on the outside world. It's a risk worth taking."
"Will you go?"
"Of course."
"Alone?"
"I will accompany you. As I was once an inhabitant of that world, I can be your guide."
"I will be accompanying you, of course. It is where I am originally from, after all."
"Hehehehehe, Lisa will finally get to experience this Omega place."
"Hmmm... Harriet's a shoe-in, but will Lisa be able to go too?"
"We are connected, so it would be possible. Although, I now exist there as a spirit. There should be no problems if it were just I..."
"Lisa wants to see what it's like to shoot enemies on Omega. She's bursting with excitement at the thought."
"...I cannot stamp out Lisa's expectations. Perhaps she could act as a sort of guard."
"...Hopefully nobody gets shot."
"Then I guess I'll also..."
"...Sorry, Second Genny. You're going to stay here and help me send them to Omega."
"What?!"
"With our current situation, it's unwise to have both Guardians absent at the same time."
"You've been ordered to rest anyway. I understand you want to help, but you'll have to stay this time."
"We'll be back soon."
"Take care of things here."
"...Alright. Stay safe."
"Xiera, go with them as their navigator."
"...But the world inside Omega is a huge jumbled mess. Am I even going to be able to navigate through that?"
"Do not worry. Omega is still as the Guardian left it."
"My coming to this world has synchronized the flow of time between here and there."
"So you're saying we'll be entering the world ruled by Marge... That's not reassuring."
"Well... I am sure Margareta has been quite successful... Probably."
"The Savior Comes Again"
"Once More In Foreign Lands"
